Episodes.Title: Caught in a Trap
Episodes.Plot: Obnoxious Janet Rig shares a room with Lil' Elvis' room; when Janet provides Li'l Elvis and Lionel with a beat, the didgibilli sound is born.

Episodes.Title: Boggled
Episodes.Plot: Li'l Elvis is not amused when WC Moore reveals his plans to transform Wannapoo into a 1950's-style theme park called Li'l Memphis.

Episodes.Title: Li'l Memphis P.T.D.
Episodes.Plot: At parent/teacher day, Janet pretends she doesn't care that her mother hasn't shown up and tells the myth of the dreaded skull truck.

Episodes.Title: Wandering Star
Episodes.Plot: When Lionel's grandfather Dex gives the kids a "pep talk," Li'l Elvis and the Truckstoppers find it so scary that they are overcome with fright and disappear into the desert.

Episodes.Title: I Hate My Own Birthday
Episodes.Plot: Li'l Elvis hates his birthday, so Janet and Lionel work overtime to make his birthday dream come true; Li'l Elvis wants to go surfing, which is no easy task in an outback town surrounded by desert.
